BYT;
/dev/sda:1000GB:scsi:512:4096:gpt:ATA HGST HTS721010A9:;
1:1049kB:473MB:472MB:ntfs::diag;
2:473MB:578MB:105MB:fat32::boot, esp;
3:578MB:17.8GB:17.2GB:linux-swap(v1)::swap;
6:17.8GB:121GB:103GB:ext4::;
7:121GB:420GB:299GB:ext4::;
8:420GB:1000GB:580GB:ext4::;

BYT;
/dev/sdb:240GB:scsi:512:512:gpt:ATA WD Green M.2 228:;
1:1049kB:106MB:105MB:fat32::boot, esp;
2:106MB:240GB:240GB:ext4::;

BYT;
/dev/sdc:1000GB:scsi:512:512:msdos:StoreJet Transcend:;
1:32.8kB:1000GB:1000GB:ntfs::boot;
